tools.description: OpenAI's conversational AI for general-purpose text generation and problem-solving
tools.detailedDescription: ChatGPT is a versatile AI assistant that excels at writing, coding, analysis, and creative tasks. It can help with code reviews, documentation, debugging, and explaining complex concepts.

tools.description: Anthropic's AI assistant focused on helpful, harmless, and honest interactions
tools.detailedDescription: Claude excels at analytical thinking, code analysis, and detailed explanations. It's particularly strong at understanding context and providing thorough, well-reasoned responses.

tools.description: Google's multimodal AI model for text, code, and image understanding
tools.detailedDescription: Gemini combines text and visual understanding, making it excellent for projects involving both code and visual elements. It integrates well with Google's ecosystem.

tools.description: AI pair programmer that suggests code completions and entire functions
tools.detailedDescription: GitHub Copilot is integrated directly into your IDE, providing real-time code suggestions, function completions, and helping with boilerplate code generation.

tools.description: AI-powered code editor with built-in AI assistance
tools.detailedDescription: Cursor is a code editor that integrates AI directly into the development workflow, offering contextual code suggestions and AI-powered editing capabilities.

tools.description: AI writing assistant for grammar, style, and clarity improvements
tools.detailedDescription: Grammarly helps improve writing quality by checking grammar, suggesting style improvements, and ensuring clarity in communication.

tools.description: AI content creation platform for marketing and business writing
tools.detailedDescription: Jasper specializes in marketing content, blog posts, social media content, and business communications with brand voice consistency.

tools.description: Integrated AI assistant within Notion for content creation and organization
tools.detailedDescription: Notion AI helps with writing, brainstorming, and organizing content directly within your Notion workspace, making it perfect for documentation and project management.

tools.description: AI image generation tool for creating artistic and professional visuals
tools.detailedDescription: Midjourney excels at creating high-quality, artistic images from text descriptions. It's particularly strong at stylized artwork and creative visuals.

tools.description: OpenAI's image generation model for creating images from text descriptions
tools.detailedDescription: DALL-E creates realistic and artistic images from natural language descriptions, with strong capabilities in photorealistic and creative imagery.

tools.description: AI-powered design assistance within Figma for UI/UX design
tools.detailedDescription: Figma AI helps with design workflows, generating design variations, and automating repetitive design tasks within the Figma interface.

tools.description: AI design tools within Canva for quick graphic creation
tools.detailedDescription: Canva AI provides automated design suggestions, background removal, and content generation within Canva's user-friendly design platform.

tools.description: AI-powered workflow automation connecting different apps and services
tools.detailedDescription: Zapier AI helps create automated workflows between different applications, reducing manual tasks and improving productivity through intelligent automation.

tools.description: Visual automation platform for connecting apps and automating workflows
tools.detailedDescription: Make provides a visual interface for creating complex automation scenarios, with AI assistance for workflow optimization and error handling.

tools.description: CI/CD automation platform with AI-assisted workflow creation
tools.detailedDescription: GitHub Actions automates software development workflows with AI assistance for creating, optimizing, and troubleshooting CI/CD pipelines.

tools.description: Open-source workflow automation tool with AI integration capabilities
tools.detailedDescription: n8n is a self-hosted automation platform that can integrate AI services and create complex workflows with visual node-based editing.

coding.name: Coding & Development
coding.description: AI tools for software development, code review, and programming assistance

writing.name: Writing & Content
writing.description: AI assistants for writing, editing, and content creation

design.name: Design & Creative
design.description: AI tools for visual design, image generation, and creative work

automation.name: Automation & Workflows
automation.description: AI-powered tools for automating tasks and creating workflows
